profile.name: Antigravity
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer
profile.description: I'm a Senior Full-Stack Developer specializing in high-performance React applications and immersive web interfaces.
profile.skills_description: I bridge the gap between design and engineering. With 5 years of experience, I've led teams to build scalable SaaS platforms and award-winning marketing sites. My tech stack is focused on modern JavaScript ecosystems.
profile.contact_text: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

projects.title: Neon Dash
projects.description: A high-performance analytics dashboard for e-commerce platforms. Features real-time data visualization, dark mode, and exportable reports.

projects.title: MindLink AI
projects.description: A conversational AI interface that mimics human interaction. Built with WebSockets for low latency and state-of-the-art NLP models.

projects.title: CryptoFlow
projects.description: A decentralized exchange frontend connecting to multiple blockchains. Focuses on security, transaction speed, and gas optimization.
